name.ja: AdGuard 広告ブロッカー (MV3 Beta)
name.pt_BR: Bloqueador de anúncio do AdGuard (MV3 Beta)
name.pt_PT: Bloqueador de publicidade do AdGuard (MV3 Beta)

short.ar: ملحق يقوم بحظر الإعلانات لا مثيل له ضد الإعلانات والنوافذ المنبثقة. يحظر الإعلانات على فيسبوك ويوتيوب وجميع مواقع الويب الأخرى.
short.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,gu,ml,mr,sw: Unmatched adblock extension against advertising and pop-ups. Blocks ads on Facebook, YouTube and all other websites.
short.bg: Ненадминато разширение на adblock, което блокира реклама и изскачащи прозорци в Facebook, YouTube и други сайтове.
short.bn,fil,kn,lv,sr,ta,te: Unmatched adblock extension against advertising and pop-ups. Blocks ads on Facebook, Youtube and all other websites.
short.ca: Extensió per bloquejar publicitat i finestres emergents. Bloqueja anuncis a Facebook, YouTube i tots els altres llocs web.
short.cs: Nepřekonané rozšíření proti reklamám a vyskakovacím oknům. Blokuje reklamy na Facebooku, YouTube a všech ostatních stránkách.
short.da: Uovertruffen adblock-udvidelse mod reklamer og pop op-vinduer. Blokerer annoncer på Facebook, YouTube og alle andre websteder.
short.de: Unübertroffene Werbeblocker-Erweiterung gegen Werbung und Pop-ups. Sperrt Werbung auf Facebook, YouTube und allen anderen Websites.
short.el: Απαράμιλλη επέκταση adblock που αποκλείει διαφημίσεις και αναδυόμενα σε Facebook, YouTube και άλλους ιστότοπους.
short.es,es_419: Inigualable extensión para bloqueo de anuncios y ventanas emergentes. Bloquea anuncios en Facebook, YouTube y los demás sitios web.
short.et: Parim reklaamiblokeerija, mis blokeerib reklaame ja hüpikaknaid kõikjal, sealhulgas Facebookis ja YouTubes.
short.fa: افزونه مسدودساز تبلیغ بی‌همتا در برابر تبلیغات و پنجره‌های بازشو. تبلیغات را در فیسبوک،یوتیوب و سایر تارنماها مسدود می‌کند.
short.fi: Ylivertainen mainosestolaajennus mainontaa ja ponnahduksia vastaan. Estää mainoksia Facebookissa, YouTubessa ja muilla sivustoilla.
short.fr: Extension sans égal contre la publicité et les pop-ups. Bloque les publicités sur Facebook, YouTube et tous les autres sites web.
short.he: הרחבה ללא תחרות של חסימת פרסומות נגד פרסום וחלונות קופצים. חוסמת פרסומות בפייסבוק, ביוטיוב ובכל האתרים האחרים.
short.hi: विज्ञापन और पॉप अप के खिलाफ बेजोड़ एडब्लॉक विस्तारफेसबुक, यूट्यूब और अन्य सभी वेबसाइटों पर विज्ञापन ब्लॉक करता है
short.hr: Najbolje proširenje za blokadu oglasa i skočnih prozora. Blokira oglase na Facebook-u, YouTube-u i drugim web stranicama.
short.hu: Páratlan adblock kiegészítő a reklámok és felugró ablakok ellen. Blokkolja a Facebook, YouTube és más webhelyek hirdetéseit.
short.id: Ekstensi adblock tidak cocok melawan iklan dan pop-ups. Blokir iklan pada Facebook, YouTube dan semua situs lainnya.
short.it: Estensione per il blocco di annunci e pop-up. Blocca le inserzioni su Facebook, YouTube e tutti gli altri siti internet.
short.ja: AdGuardは、広告やポップアップ対処には比類のない広告ブロック拡張機能です。Facebook、YouTubeやその他のサイトで広告をブロックします。
short.ko: 광고, 팝업, Facebook이나 YouTube 등 사이트의 광고를 차단하는 타의 추종을 불허하는 광고 차단 확장 프로그램입니다.
short.lt: Nepralenkiama apsauga nuo reklamų ir iškylančių langų. Blokuoja skelbimus Facebook, YouTube ir visose kitose svetainėse.
short.ms: Penyambung terbaik untuk halang iklan pop-keluar di Facebook, YouTube dan semua laman web.
short.nl: Ongeëvenaarde adblocker tegen advertenties en pop-ups. Blokkeert advertenties op Facebook, YouTube en andere websites.
short.no: Uovertruffen adblock-udvidelse mod annoncering og pop-ups. Blokerer annoncer på Facebook, YouTube og alle andre websteder.
short.pl: Rozszerzenie blokujące reklamy i wyskakujące okienka. Blokuje reklamy na Facebooku, YouTube i innych stronach internetowych.
short.pt_BR: Uma extensão de bloqueio incomparável contra anúncios e pop-ups. Bloqueia os anúncios do Facebook, YouTube e todos outros sites.
short.pt_PT: Extensão de bloqueio de anúncios eficaz contra publicidade e popups. Bloqueia anúncios no Facebook, no YouTube e outros sítios.
short.ro: Extensie fără egal de blocare reclame și pop-up-uri. Blochează reclame pe Facebook, YouTube și toate celelalte site-uri.
short.ru: Эффективное расширение для блокировки рекламы и всплывающих окон. Блокирует рекламу в VK, Одноклассниках, YouTube и других сайтах.
short.sk: Neprekonané rozšírenie proti reklamám a vyskakovacím oknám. Blokuje reklamy na Facebooku, YouTube a na ostatných webových stránkach.
short.sl: Neujemajoča se razširitev za zaviranje oglasov. Zavira oglase na Facebooku, YouTubeu in vseh drugih spletnih straneh.
short.sv: Oöverträffat tillägg för blockering av annonser och popups. Blockerar annonser på Facebook, YouTube och på alla andra webbplatser.
short.th: ส่วนขยาย adblock ที่ไม่ตรงกันกับการโฆษณาและป๊อปอัป ปิดกั้นโฆษณาบน Facebook, YouTube และเว็บไซต์อื่น ๆ ทั้งหมด
short.tr: Reklamları ve açılır pencereleri engelleyen eşsiz uzantı. Facebook, YouTube ve diğer tüm sitelerdeki reklamları engeller.
short.uk: Неперевершений захист від реклами та спливних вікон. Блокує рекламу на Facebook, YouTube та усіх інших сайтах.
short.vi: Ứng dụng ngăn chặn tuyệt đối quảng cáo và cửa sổ bật lên. Loại bỏ quảng cáo trên Facebook, Youtube và tất cả các trang web khác.
short.zh_CN: 一款无与伦比的广告拦截扩展，用以对抗各式广告与弹窗。可以拦截 Facebook、YouTube 和其它所有网站的广告。
short.zh_TW: 防備廣告和彈出式視窗之無與倫比的廣告封鎖擴充功能。封鎖於 Facebook、YouTube 和所有其它的網站上之廣告。

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,fa,fr,:
Unmatched adblock extension against advertising, tracking and pop-ups.This prototype is going to be merged with AdGuard Browser extension in the future and will reliably block ads even within the rigid bounds of Manifest V3.

Surely you're familiar with AdGuard Browser extension, which effectively blocks all kinds of Internet ads. But with the release of Manifest V3, it will no longer work. To keep you from remembering what pop-ups, ad banners and ad videos look like, and to make you feel safe knowing that the extension protects you from trackers, malicious and phishing sites, we created AdGuard Browser extension V3.   

==============================

Read about Manifest V3 on our blog: https://adguard.com/en/blog/manifestv3-timeline.html

==============================

Any questions or bug reports are very welcome to be left here: https://github.com/AdGuardTeam/AdGuardBrowserExtension/issues 

Or at our forum: https://forum.adguard.com/

==============================
long.am,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,gu,ml,mr,sw:
Unmatched adblock extension against advertising, tracking and pop-ups. Our Manifest V3 prototype has been finally merged with AdGuard Browser extension and we are happy to announce the first beta!

Surely you're familiar with AdGuard Browser extension, which effectively blocks all kinds of Internet ads. But with the release of Manifest V3, it will no longer work. To keep you from remembering what pop-ups, ad banners and ad videos look like, and to make you feel safe knowing that the extension protects you from trackers, malicious and phishing sites, we created AdGuard Browser extension V3.   

Any questions or bug reports are very welcome to be left here: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardMV3/issues
